name: GlitchBity Alpha Demo 0.1
description:
Test for movement and controls + minor glitches to add to the game

I hope you all enjoy it and provide any feedback or ideas you want for our game.

Glitchbity Release Time Frame: June 2023 - December 2023

 ( Offical demo out Jan 2023 )
